title: ethereum_ethOS_install.rar
description:
The best mining platform for ethereum now for FREE!!! and on any kind of Hard Drive (doesn't have to be SSD)

1.Download torrent
2.unpack
3.Open HDDRawcopy application 
4.Select source the .imgc file ethOS_1.0.4.imgc
5.Select target disk the other HDD
6. burn image to hdd
7.Boot image hdd

When you start ethOS-linux just replace default wallet with your wallet and reboot.
Then you are all set to mining

You can use rufus application for making USB (USB must be min 32 GB) but HDDRawCopy is recommended
